## Description The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K 5 WCM Leistung, die überzeugt: Der Hochdruckreiniger K 5 WCM mit wassergekühltem und leistungsstarken Motor ist optimal bei Verschmutzung auf Wegen, Terrassen und Autos geeignet. ## Description of the Figure The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components: - **Pressure Washer Unit**: - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents. - It has a handle on top for easy transportation. - Two wheels are visible at the base for mobility. - The front features a connection point for hoses and accessories. - **Accessories**: - A coiled black hose is included, likely for water supply or pressure output. - A black spray gun with a yellow trigger is part of the set. - Two different spray lances are provided, each with distinct nozzles for varied spray patterns. ## Awards and Certifications - **Guinness World Records**: The product is noted as a record holder. - **World's No. 1 Pressure Washer Brand**: This accolade is highlighted, indicating a leading position in the market. - **Design Awards**: - iF Design Award 2023 - Red Dot Award 2023 ## Manufacturing Information - **Made in Europe**: The product is manufactured in Europe, as indicated by the European Union flag. This detailed description captures all visible elements and contextual information from the image, providing a comprehensive understanding of the product and its accolades. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.324-400.0 - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278907178
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12,5
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 15,9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 369 × 329 × 901
## Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 8
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Wassergeregelter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [x]

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K 5 WCM

Leistung, die überzeugt: Der Hochdruckreiniger K 5 WCM mit wassergekühltem und leistungsstarken Motor ist optimal bei Verschmutzung auf Wegen, Terrassen und Autos geeignet.

## Description of the Figure

The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components:

- **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
  - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents.
  - It has a handle on top for easy transportation.
  - Two wheels are visible at the base for mobility.
  - The front features a connection point for hoses and accessories.

- **Accessories**:
  - A coiled black hose is included, likely for water supply or pressure output.
  - A black spray gun with a yellow trigger is part of the set.
  - Two different spray lances are provided, each with distinct nozzles for varied spray patterns.

## Awards and Certifications

- **Guinness World Records**: The product is noted as a record holder.
- **World's No. 1 Pressure Washer Brand**: This accolade is highlighted, indicating a leading position in the market.
- **Design Awards**:
  - iF Design Award 2023
  - Red Dot Award 2023

## Manufacturing Information

- **Made in Europe**: The product is manufactured in Europe, as indicated by the European Union flag.

This detailed description captures all visible elements and contextual information from the image, providing a comprehensive understanding of the product and its accolades.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.324-400.0

- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel
- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung

## Technische Daten

Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 369 × 329 × 901
